structure.unit: Real And Personal Property And Domestic Relations
General Provisions Relative To Real Property

law.catch_line: Conveyance Vesting Life Estate And Remainder To Heirs
law.text: If land is granted or devised to a person and after his death to his heirs in fee, however the grant or devise is expressed, an estate for life only shall vest in such first taker, and a remainder in fee simple in his heirs.
